price: Kun hundi yakki isaa Gooftaa kee biratti jibbamaa ta’eera.
arabic: كُلُّ ذَٰلِكَ كَانَ سَيِّئُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّكَ مَكۡرُوهٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: kullu dhālika kāna sayyi-uhu ʿinda rabbika makrūhan
